name: Refrigerator Decor #5
description:
Unique Paper Creations at an affordable price. Each piece starts with recycled paper as its backing with natural inclusions. In addition, each magnet may contain the following; acrylic paint, printed materials, and gifted items that help inspire each piece.

All magnets dimensions; approx. 3.5" tall x 2.5" Wide.

Each piece can be reproduced. However, in reproducing the shades will be different on both the paper, painting, and the natural material used. I can forward a picture before purchase.

Also, if you would like to use as a favor/gift and prefer that the magnets not be affixed please let me know before shipping.

This item should be kept in an area with low humidity, away from direct sunlight, and is NOT water resistant.

Please use caution when placing and removing magnets as not to cause scratching to applied surfaces.
